ComicInfo.Title: Proper Preparation and Planning, Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
With Hughie absent, Butcher re-examines The Boys' first encounter with The Seven, trying to figure out what went wrong. But first there's some disquiet in the ranks to be dealt with, not to mention the return of an old and unexpected enemy - who finally, incredibly, has come into his own. Meanwhile, on The Seven's floating headquarters, a flying lesson goes badly awry... "Proper Preparation and Planning", Part One.
Notes:
The cover is a homage and a parody of the cover of Batman: The Dark Knight #1.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:08. [CVDB240634]
ComicInfo.Characters: A-Train, Black Noir, Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Jack from Jupiter, James Stillwell, Jess Bradley, Kessler, Mother's Milk, Queen Maeve, Susan L. Rayner, Terror, The Homelander
ComicInfo.Teams: The Boys, The Seven, Vought American
ComicInfo.Locations: Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State
